# Implementation Status

This brief represents a comprehensive greenfield specification. All detailed user stories, acceptance criteria, functional requirements, and implementation tasks from the original specification documents have been consolidated here. When implemented, this project will deliver:

- **8 MVP Features**: Complete feature set with user stories, acceptance tests, and success criteria
- **100+ Functional Requirements**: Precise, testable requirements with validation criteria
- **300+ Implementation Tasks**: Detailed TDD workflow with test-first approach
- **80%+ Test Coverage Mandate**: Unit, integration, contract, and performance tests
- **Production-Ready Quality**: Security, performance, observability, and compliance built-in
